task.title: Add Dictionaries for the AutoCorrect Feature

context.p: To add new dictionaries for the AutoCorrect feature, or to replace an existing one, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the files you need for your language dictionary.
If you are creating a new dictionary, copy the downloaded .dat files to the autocorrect subfolder of the preferences folder.
step.info:
The preferences folder is [APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml[APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml.author>[APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER]/com.oxygenxml.developer, where [APPLICATION-DATA-FOLDER] is:
C:\Users\[USER-NAME]\AppData\Roaming on Windows Vista/7/8/10
[USER-HOME-FOLDER]/Library/Preferences on OS X
[USER-HOME-FOLDER] on Linux

step.cmd: If you are updating an existing dictionary, copy the .dat file to the following folder: /dicts/autocorrect.
Restart the application after copying the dictionary files.

itemgroup.note: You can setup to use dictionaries from a custom location configured in the Dictionaries preferences page.
